document_data.mainbody:
laise Hhune was a member of the Hhune patriar family of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
At some point in the , Blaise Hhune became afflicted by lycanthropy, the affliction that led him into the servitude of the Kozakuran vampire Cazador Szarr, the lord of the Szarr Palace in Baldurs Gate. Along with Gheris Hhune, Duver Rillyn, and other werewolves, Blaise massacred a party of influential guests at the Szarr Palace, shortly before Cazador attempted to perform his ascension ritual. The beasts and lycanthropes were likely put out of their misery by the Absolute Adversaries and the vampire spawn Astarion Ancun√≠n.
